mapper.select: SELECT U.NICKNAME , R.COMMENT , R.DATE , R.TIME FROM RANKING R JOIN USER U ON R.RANK_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY R.TIME ASC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{startNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RANKING R JOIN USER U ON R.RANK_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT U.NICKNAME, R.COMMENT, R.DATE, R.TIME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.TIME ASC) as `rank` FROM RANKING R JOIN USER U ON R.RANK_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.GAME = 'theHostel' ORDER BY R.TIME ASC LIMIT 1
